issue.title: [CI] Crossbow should comment cause of failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14476](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14476). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of just giving a thumbs down, Crossbow should comment with a link to the failing job (e.g. https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4010195788?check_suite_focus=true), or its stack trace (usually under 'handle github commit event').
